name: Par-a-Dice
description:
Go golfing with a twist. Using a D20 as your ball, make your way to the hole while avoiding sand traps, launching through speed boosts, and bouncing off walls. Be smart with your hits - the number rolled on the die determines the power of your next shot.

Can you beat the par?

Controls: Left click to shoot and change club, mouse wheel to zoom

Created by Robert Jones, Robbie Goldberg, and Tim Durbin

Golf club icons: surang

D20 model: DutraBR98
